events.name: Drone attack on Russian oil refinery
events.wd_label: Drone attack on Russian oil refinery
events.wd_description: Dramatic footage emerged of a drone crashing into the Novoshakhtinsk oil refinery in Rostov, causing a fiery explosion in what appears to be an attack inside Russia's borders.
events.description: Dramatic footage emerged of a drone crashing into the Novoshakhtinsk oil refinery in Rostov, causing a fiery explosion in what appears to be an attack inside Russia's borders.

events.name: Details of the attack
events.wd_description: The drone crashed into the oil refinery, potentially breaching Russia's air defense. Ukraine has not claimed responsibility for the attack.
events.description: The drone crashed into the oil refinery, potentially breaching Russia's air defense. Ukraine has not claimed responsibility for the attack.

events.name: Implications of the attack
events.wd_description: If confirmed, the drone was either launched from within Russia or passed through Russian-controlled territory, evading Russian air defense systems.
events.description: If confirmed, the drone was either launched from within Russia or passed through Russian-controlled territory, evading Russian air defense systems.

events.name: Impact on refinery operations
events.wd_description: No one was hurt in the incident, but the refinery has ceased operations pending repairs.
events.description: No one was hurt in the incident, but the refinery has ceased operations pending repairs.

events.name: Flood traps miners in Canadian-owned mine
events.wd_label: Flood traps miners in Canadian-owned mine
events.wd_description: A flood from torrential rainfall caused miners to be trapped in a Canadian-owned mine, prompting a 24-hour rescue effort with specialized equipment from Ghana and South Africa.
events.description: A flood from torrential rainfall caused miners to be trapped in a Canadian-owned mine, prompting a 24-hour rescue effort with specialized equipment from Ghana and South Africa.

events.name: Rescue efforts
events.wd_description: The rescue effort has been ongoing 24-hours a day, utilizing specialized equipment to pump millions of liters of water out of the mine.
events.description: The rescue effort has been ongoing 24-hours a day, utilizing specialized equipment to pump millions of liters of water out of the mine.

events.name: Search in first refuge chamber
events.wd_description: After 4 weeks, rescuers reached the first refuge chamber at 560 meters from the surface, but no miners were found.
events.description: After 4 weeks, rescuers reached the first refuge chamber at 560 meters from the surface, but no miners were found.

events.name: Search in second refuge chamber
events.wd_description: Efforts are now directed towards reaching the second refuge chamber at 710 meters from the surface, despite difficult working conditions.
events.description: Efforts are now directed towards reaching the second refuge chamber at 710 meters from the surface, despite difficult working conditions.

events.name: Miners' families
events.wd_description: The miners' wives have gathered near the area, holding prayer congregations with hopes of their husbands being found alive.
events.description: The miners' wives have gathered near the area, holding prayer congregations with hopes of their husbands being found alive.

events.name: Devastating flood in Kabul, May 2022
events.wd_description: A devastating flood in Kabul and 12 other provinces resulted in 22 deaths, 40 injuries, and widespread destruction of homes and crops amid an ongoing humanitarian crisis in Afghanistan.
events.description: A devastating flood in Kabul and 12 other provinces resulted in 22 deaths, 40 injuries, and widespread destruction of homes and crops amid an ongoing humanitarian crisis in Afghanistan.

events.name: Impact on Kabul and provinces
events.wd_description: The flood severely affected 12 provinces, with the worst impact in Badghis, Fyrab, and Baghlan, leading to 22 deaths, 40 injuries, destruction of 500 houses, and loss of 3000 acres of crops.
events.description: The flood severely affected 12 provinces, with the worst impact in Badghis, Fyrab, and Baghlan, leading to 22 deaths, 40 injuries, destruction of 500 houses, and loss of 3000 acres of crops.

events.name: Humanitarian crisis and response
events.wd_description: The ongoing humanitarian crisis in Afghanistan worsened due to the flood, with the Red Cross providing aid while the international community grapples with how to assist without legitimizing the Taliban.
events.description: The ongoing humanitarian crisis in Afghanistan worsened due to the flood, with the Red Cross providing aid while the international community grapples with how to assist without legitimizing the Taliban.

events.name: Allegations of forced labor in Chinese EV battery material production
events.wd_label: Allegations of forced labor in Chinese EV battery material production
events.wd_description: Chinese companies producing raw materials for EV batteries are reported to use forced labor, according to The New York Times.
events.description: Chinese companies producing raw materials for EV batteries are reported to use forced labor, according to The New York Times.

events.name: Xinjiang Nonferrous Metal Industry employment practices
events.wd_label: Xinjiang Nonferrous Metal Industry employment practices
events.wd_description: Xinjiang Nonferrous Metal Industry employs hundreds of Uyghurs as part of a work transfer program, moving ethnic minorities from south to north Xinjiang for industrial jobs.
events.description: Xinjiang Nonferrous Metal Industry employs hundreds of Uyghurs as part of a work transfer program, moving ethnic minorities from south to north Xinjiang for industrial jobs.

events.name: Chinese response to allegations
events.wd_description: Liu Pengyu, a spokesperson for the Chinese embassy in the U.S., denied allegations of forced labor, calling them a big lie against logic, facts, and legal principles.
events.description: Liu Pengyu, a spokesperson for the Chinese embassy in the U.S., denied allegations of forced labor, calling them a big lie against logic, facts, and legal principles.

events.name: U.S. State Department and independent researcher findings
events.wd_label: U.S. State Department and independent researcher findings
events.wd_description: The U.S. State Department noted that transferred workers are at risk of forced labor, and Chinese academic publications described labor transfers as a means to fragment Uyghur society and mitigate the impact of religion.
events.description: The U.S. State Department noted that transferred workers are at risk of forced labor, and Chinese academic publications described labor transfers as a means to fragment Uyghur society and mitigate the impact of religion.

events.name: Social media posts by Xinjiang Nonferrous
events.wd_label: Social media posts by Xinjiang Nonferrous
events.wd_description: Translated posts showed that workers from mostly Muslim minorities were lectured on eradicating religious extremism and embracing Chinese nationhood.
events.description: Translated posts showed that workers from mostly Muslim minorities were lectured on eradicating religious extremism and embracing Chinese nationhood.

events.name: Chinese authorities' denial
events.wd_description: Chinese authorities, including Foreign Ministry spokesperson Wang Wenbin, denied claims of forced labor, stating that workers' rights are protected.
events.description: Chinese authorities, including Foreign Ministry spokesperson Wang Wenbin, denied claims of forced labor, stating that workers' rights are protected.

events.name: Xinjiang Nonferrous Metal Industry exports
events.wd_description: Xinjiang Nonferrous produces minerals and metals, including lithium, nickel, and copper, exporting to the U.S., Germany, U.K., Japan, and India, though current relationships are unclear.
events.description: Xinjiang Nonferrous produces minerals and metals, including lithium, nickel, and copper, exporting to the U.S., Germany, U.K., Japan, and India, though current relationships are unclear.

events.name: Uyghur Forced Labor Prevention Act
events.wd_description: The Uyghur Forced Labor Prevention Act bans goods made with forced labor in Xinjiang from entering the U.S. market, potentially affecting thousands of companies with supply chain links to Xinjiang.
events.description: The Uyghur Forced Labor Prevention Act bans goods made with forced labor in Xinjiang from entering the U.S. market, potentially affecting thousands of companies with supply chain links to Xinjiang.
